answers.answer: It helped me to elevate them and wrap a cool wash cloth around each foot. It helps pull the blood flow back out of your feet and into the rest of ur body :) hope u find some relief soon momma

question: My ankles, feet and legs are so swollen tonight! I hate the elevated and I drank a big glassn of water! The swelling hasn't really gone down. My blood pressure is perfectly fine so preeclampsia isn't the problem! Anyone know how to get the swelling to go down?
title: swollen feet ankles and legs
